name: Demon's Marrow
flavorText: Sulam had a vision of creating a suit of armor, crafted from the flesh of demons, in order to use their power against them.
flavorTextHtml: Sulam had a vision of creating a suit of armor, crafted from the flesh of demons, in order to use their power against them.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 +6000 Fire Thorns Damage(3) Set:     
 Chance to Deal 25% Area Damage on Hit.(4) Set:     
 +15% Damage to Demons    
 Chance to reflect projectiles when you are hit by enemies.
